answers.answer: Um I had sever preeclampsia. It does not sound like you have.it sounds like you are either dehydrated, not sleeping well, or have an allergy headache.

I've gotten random headaches thru out each of my pregnancies!! It can be from hormones, dehydration, exhaustion, low blood sugar, etc..if you don't have symptoms of preeclampsia don't stress urself out abt it hun!!! :-)

question: I work with a lot of nurses and they all have me freaking out. I woke up around midnight with a severe headache took some tylenol then went back to bed. When I woke up to go to work, I still had a bad headache so I took some more tylenol. The nurses said it may be preeclampsia even though my BP isn't high right now. I don't go back to the doctor until next Friday, should I call my doctor just in case? I am kind of scared because I don't want to go on bed rest this early, I am only 25 weeks 3 days. Also, I haven't been having a decrease in my urine output, I am not swollen anywhere. I just have the severe headache. Just curious if anybody else has been told they have preeclampsia now or with a previous pregnancy. Thank you much.
title: preeclampsia?
